info.title: SNAP E-Wallet API
info.description: Backend Integration to check status API

post.description: Backend Integration to check status API

parameters.name: X-TIMESTAMP
parameters.description: Client's current local time with format : YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZD

parameters.name: X-PARTNER-ID
parameters.description: Client ID for merchant that generated by DOKU

parameters.name: X-EXTERNAL-ID
parameters.description: Reference number that should be unique in the same day or to be known as Request ID

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Represents access_token of a request; Keyword starts with “Bearer ” followed by access_token

parameters.name: Content type
parameters.description: The media type of the resource

requestBody.description: Here is the sample of request body to get status of E-Wallet :

200.description: The response will be similar to HTTP notification. Some parameters might not be presented in certain status cases, please check our Postman Collection to try it yourself.

OVO-OpenAPISale-SuccessPayment.summary: OVO Open API Sale - Success Payment

OVO-OpenAPIRecurring-SuccessPayment.summary: OVO Open API Recurring - Success Payment

RequestBody.description: Request body to get status of E-Wallet

originalPartnerReferenceNo.description: Original transaction identifier on service consumer system

originalReferenceNo.description: Original transaction identifier on service provider system

serviceCode.description: API type indicator. Use : 55 for Check Status API

merchantId.description: Merchant identifier that is unique per each merchant

originalReferenceNo.description: Original transaction identifier on service provider system.

originalPartnerReferenceNo.description: Original transaction identifier on service consumer system

latestTransactionStatus.description: Unique identifier for this Payment from PJP. Mandatory if Payment happened.
latestTransactionStatus.example:
00 = Success,
01 = Initiated,
02 = Paying,
03 = Pending,
04 = Refunded,
05 = Canceled,
06 = Failed,
07 = Not Found

transAmount.description: Transaction amount that will be paid using this payment method If it's IDR then value includes 2 decimal digits.

 HH:mm:Ss ( Optional )
